manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: GuiMemi Bidet Sprayer Handheld Bidet Sprayer Applicable Scenarioc Toilet Sprayer can be used as a diaper hose, for, cleaning the toilet or for giving your pet a shower Available to supply other multiple uses according to your various requirement, such as pet shower, car washer, flower sprayer, baby shower.

GuiMemi handheld bidet sprayer Two Water Pressure Modes of Sprayers The water pressure can be changed from jet spray to soft spray, meet your various daily use. The jet spray can be used for cleaning toilet, floors, carpets or baby cloth diapers. The soft spray mode is ideal for women during pregnancy and menstrual cycles to get a gentle and thorough clean up, or such as pet shower. Such a practical tool beyond imagination!

GuiMemi Premium Quality Parts & Healthy Superior brushed finish for rust-proof, anti-corrosion is easier to maintain and operate. The bidets for existing toilets consist of a 304 stainless steel bidet nozzle, a stainless steel hose and a brass valve to ensure durability. Equipped with explosion-proof water pipes, which can accept stronger water pressure. This bidet sprayer set is equipped with rubber washes, and there is no need to wrap the waterproof tape when after using the rubber washers. High-precision manufacturing process, the interface fits well and does not leak.

Full Installation Steps: *STEP 1: Turn off the water supply valve (on the wall). *STEP 2: Flush toilet (holding down the handle) to empty the tank completely. *STEP 3: Disconnect toilet water supply hose from under toilet tank. Put the Flat Rubber Washer inside the nut of the T-valve(7/8" female). Connect T-valve at the toilet tank and reconnect the toilet water supply hose to the bottom of the T-valve(7/8" male). Be sure not to over tighten connections. *STEP 4: Attach one end of the Bidet Hose(hex nut) to the T-valve(G1/2 male) and the other end to the Sprayer Head . *STEP 5: Mount Sprayer holder. *STEP 6: Turn water supply valve back on at the wall and check for leaks using plumbers tape when necessary. Wait 5 minutes and check again. If no leaks, then you are all set!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality, easy to install!
reviews.reviewText: I was worried about getting the wrong size, but luckily it works out perfectly! Great value for such quality product. It took me 5mins to get the bidet installed and there’s no leakage occur since I’ve used it. I especially liked the holder design, it makes it even easier for the bidet to be secured. It’s convenient and it just makes life easier. Very satisfied with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good quality, but wrong size for U.S. (not 7/8")
reviews.reviewText: GuiMemi Handheld Bidet Sprayer for Toilet Bidet Sprayer Premium Stainless Steel Jet Sprayer for Toilet Water Sprayer Handheld Bidet Perfect for Whole Family Cleaning UseGood quality, but wrong size for U.S. (not 7/8")I've installed these on previous toilets, so I expected this installation to be a breeze, but I was surprised to find the T-valve wasn't the right size for my toilet. This sent me down a rabbit hole of researching plumbing parts, particularly what that valve sticking out of the friggen toilet is actually called. So I found that US toilets typically have a 7/8" valve, which is an uncommon size in general for most other parts. I ended up having to buy a separate T-valve, which cost half of what this package retails for. Once it was all put together, it worked great!If you haven't used one before, it's best practice to keep the valve in the off position when it's not being used to reduce pressure on the hose and prevent any leaks. I've never had a leak, but I've always kept mine turned off when not in use. These tend to have very high pressure, but the handle is pressure sensitive, so go easy when you press it until you have it to the desired pressure. These are handy little devices - in addition to use as a bidet, they're also great for cleaning the toilet bowl (be careful of splashback), diapers or other soiled clothes, and the bathroom sink, or shower, or bathtub if they can reach.This bidet seems very high quality and I believe the size I received would fit most European fixtures. It's possible the issue has been addressed, since the listing now shows a 7/8" size, which I don't remember seeing before, but it would be a good idea to check with the seller before purchasing.(submitted 11/22/2023)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Makes cleanup easier
reviews.reviewText: If I were greedy, I would say this bidet is awful because it doesn't have warm water and it has no way of producing warm water, but for the price you shouldn't expect it to. But simply a hose that you can attach to the side of your toilet, so you can clean yourself and clean the toilet as well. It's solidly constructed, easy to assemble, easy to attach to the toilet, and easy to use. As a point of personal preference, I also like it because it has a matte finish as opposed to a glossy finish. 10/10 would buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Might not fit your toilet, either
reviews.reviewText: I recently bought a bidet for my master bathroom and I was very pleased with it. It saves you time, water, and money and they are also affordable.So I decided to order another one for the guest bathroom. Unfortunately, I ran into the same issue as everyone else who has tried this bidet: the thread size does not go with any of the toilets in my house. I believe this needs to be mentioned in the listing, so that customers don't run into this issue.I will buy an adapter because I really want to get this working and will come back to update the review.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Expected and worked
reviews.reviewText: Items come with complete sets, same as what the product image shows. The sprayer is strong and good for restroom cleaning. I bought it for ~$18, I think it‘s a good price for a set like this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars It doesn't fit
reviews.reviewText: I was so excited when I got this, but the connection part doesn't fit on my toilet. I've looked everywhere for adapters but nothing fits. It's just sitting in the box at this point and I hope I'll stumble across an adapter so I can use it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars The button to release water is too loose but otherwise good
reviews.reviewText: The bidet is easy to install, works well, no leaks so far after 2 months of use. The pieces all fit nicely into their places and the water comes out well. The only issue is that actual part you push to release water is loose so you barely have to press on it to release water and it doesn't go back to its original place once released.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have bidet sprayers on my toilets, and I don’t know how I lived without such a convenience. This sprayer has a feature that my other sprayers do not. There is a lever with which you can close off the sprayer. That is convenient if you have curious little children that might want to play with the sprayer and hose down your bathroom. You can hang the hook on your toilet tank to hang up the sprayer to avoid putting holes in your wall or cabinet. Personally, I like to hang the sprayer on the cabinet to avoid twisting around to reach it. This bidet sprayer has a wonderful, heavy weight feel and a nice looking quality. The colors of the metal do not match perfectly. This is very easy to install. This sprayer is an excellent quality sprayer. The water that comes out is, of course, simply cold water. If you are afraid that you won’t be able to stand the cold water, don’t be. It is not a big deal and for short time you use it, it is easily tolerated. I wish I could turn back time and install these after having my children. This would make an excellent gift for a new mother!
